Question: The stadium's street number is 755, after this person's total number of home runs.
Hints: The Braves assigned this person to the Eau Claire Bears, the Braves' Northern League Class-C farm team.
At the age of 39, this person hit 40 home runs in 392 at-bats, ending the 1973 season one home run short of the record.
In 1999, The Sporting News ranked this person fifth on their "100 Greatest Baseball Players" list.
